tool_input.command:
export GH_TOKEN="${GITHUB_PAT}" && gh pr create --title "feat: #5 - Add new task" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

This PR implements task creation functionality with a modal form interface, as specified in issue #5.

## Implementation Plan

See: [specs/feature-5-add-new-task.md](specs/feature-5-add-new-task.md)

## Closes

Closes #5

## ADW Tracking ID

4083bb3a

## What Was Done

- [x] Added Task model with required fields (date, title, description, type)
- [x] Implemented modal form UI with validation for all mandatory fields
- [x] Added task type selection (personal, work, other) with color coding
- [x] Integrated with server endpoint to create tasks
- [x] Implemented task retrieval and display in week view
- [x] Enhanced UI to show tasks as cards within date boxes
- [x] Added comprehensive tests for task creation API

## Key Changes

- **Frontend**: 
  - `app/client/src/app/app.component.ts`: Added modal logic, form handling, and task display
  - `app/client/src/app/app.component.html`: Added modal UI and task card rendering
  - `app/client/src/app/app.component.css`: Styled modal and task cards with type-based colors
  - `app/client/src/app/models/task.model.ts`: Added task type field
  - `app/client/src/app/services/task.service.ts`: Added getTasksByWeek method
  
- **Backend**:
  - `app/server/models.py`: Added task_type field to Task model
  - `app/server/database.py`: Updated database schema
  - `app/server/crud.py`: Enhanced task creation and retrieval logic
  - `app/server/tests/test_api.py`: Added comprehensive test coverage
EOF
)" --base main
